title: Fragment, 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic thread
Technique: cut and uncut supplementary warp pile (velvet) with supplementary weft
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Fragment of red cut and uncut velvet on yellow silk ground with extra metallic weft. Two portions of curving large-scale foliage are all that show of the design.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, 17th century.
17th century. Medium: silk, metallic thread
Technique: cut and uncut supplementary warp pile (velvet) with supplementary weft. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1921-22-11.
